alert.note: Alert for Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jim Hogg, central Starr and southeastern Zapata Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Viboras, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Sauz, Viboras, Garciasville, La Puerta, Ringgold Middle School, Fort Ringgold County Park, Starr County Sheriffs Office, Rio Grande City Municipal Airport, Las Lomas and Rio Grande City Fire Department. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 822 and 828. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
